column5: Films with any lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender, queer, intersex, asexual, pansexual, agender, aromantic, questioning, bigender, third gender, queer, non-binary, or otherwise not cisgender or heterosexual content. Or directors/performers where noteworthy. Not necessarily explicit nor even positive depictions; I merely have to have a more or less positive view of the film overall. Includes films I or others have drawn queer or trans readings from without explicit trans or queer content, but as always, I will be the judge of that. Not in database: V.O. (4.5)
